MS.S: A PowerShell module for handling color and cursor positioning via ANSI escape sequences

2.0.0: Breaking change for the library:_x000D__x000A_ - Merge the "Colormine" namespace into PoshCode.Pansies_x000D__x000A_ Originally, this was a 3rd party MIT licensed library by @THEJoeZack._x000D__x000A_ He pulled his repo, so I am now just integrating it into Pansies_x000D__x000A_ - Expose Complement and Gradient in the C# library for others to use_x000D__x000A_ - Add GetComplement() method to RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ - Add PoshCode.Pansies.Gradient class with GetGradient static method_x000D__x000A_ - Add Get-Complement and Get-Gradient wrappers in module assembly_x000D__x000A_ 1.3.0: The color provider release_x000D__x000A_ - Add a RgbColor PSProvider that can convert colors to their escape sequences_x000D__x000A_ - Add Fg: drive and Bg: drive so you can "$Fg:Red$Bg:Blue$YourMessage"_x000D__x000A_ - Add support for x11 color names to make the drives more useful_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.2: Use full namespace + class name for RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.1: Fix cmdlet export so New-Text and Write-Host show back up_x000D__x000A_ Make EXTERNALHELP work for functions_x000D__x000A_ Provide help for Get-Complement_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.0: Better support for using ConsoleColors_x000D__x000A_ Added Get-Complement to calculate the HSL complement or contrasting colors_x000D__x000A_ Fixed ConsolePalette so it reads the current console colors when possible_x000D__x000A_ 1.1.0: Support for serialization by the Configuration module_x000D__x000A_ Fix output of "bright" color object in ConEmu (workaround ConEmu bug)_x000D__x000A_ 1.0.0: Pre-release version with support for RGB colors
A PowerShell module for handling color and cursor positioning via ANSI escape sequences

2.0.0: Breaking change for the library:_x000D__x000A_ - Merge the "Colormine" namespace into PoshCode.Pansies_x000D__x000A_ Originally, this was a 3rd party MIT licensed library by @THEJoeZack._x000D__x000A_ He pulled his repo, so I am now just integrating it into Pansies_x000D__x000A_ - Expose Complement and Gradient in the C# library for others to use_x000D__x000A_ - Add GetComplement() method to RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ - Add PoshCode.Pansies.Gradient class with GetGradient static method_x000D__x000A_ - Add Get-Complement and Get-Gradient wrappers in module assembly_x000D__x000A_ 1.3.0: The color provider release_x000D__x000A_ - Add a RgbColor PSProvider that can convert colors to their escape sequences_x000D__x000A_ - Add Fg: drive and Bg: drive so you can "$Fg:Red$Bg:Blue$YourMessage"_x000D__x000A_ - Add support for x11 color names to make the drives more useful_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.2: Use full namespace + class name for RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.1: Fix cmdlet export so New-Text and Write-Host show back up_x000D__x000A_ Make EXTERNALHELP work for functions_x000D__x000A_ Provide help for Get-Complement_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.0: Better support for using ConsoleColors_x000D__x000A_ Added Get-Complement to calculate the HSL complement or contrasting colors_x000D__x000A_ Fixed ConsolePalette so it reads the current console colors when possible_x000D__x000A_ 1.1.0: Support for serialization by the Configuration module_x000D__x000A_ Fix output of "bright" color object in ConEmu (workaround ConEmu bug)_x000D__x000A_ 1.0.0: Pre-release version with support for RGB colors

ANSI EscapeSequences VirtualTerminal Color PSModule PSEdition_Core PSEdition_Desktop PSCmdlet_New-Text PSCommand_New-Text PSCmdlet_Write-Host PSCommand_Write-Host PSCmdlet_Get-Gradient PSCommand_Get-Gradient PSCmdlet_Get-Complement PSCommand_Get-Complement PSCmdlet_Get-ColorWheel PSCommand_Get-ColorWheel PSIncludes_Cmdlet
